data.title: 8 corners with turbo crusts are hard to beat
data.text: The Jet 10 with 8 corners with turbo crusts are hard to beat. Absolutely amazing pizza. Even for someone who had preferred thin crust pizzas, I am hooked.

data.title: BEST PIZZA IN FLORIDA !!!!!
data.text: I moved from carle place New York to Pompano Beach two months ago .I tried jets pizza !!!the Best Pizza in Florida !!!staff Friendly my favorite here is Amy she is Fabulous and that place without you is nothing

data.title: I love there food and service
data.text: this place is awesome and they have gluten pasta who have that problem and hard to find a place that does gluten they do also for the no meat lovers they have veggie pizza, calzones and the people there are super friendly just moving here from NYC I couldn't find a pizza place like I had back home just when I lost all hope I found this place driving for a job interview it was faith and now for two yrs this is the only place I go but one thing is that they don't serve pasta but if I was looking for pasta I would go find a pasta restaurant but I was looking for 🍕 and order wings or a salad every other day

data.title: Back to Pompano Beach ,  finally , with all new menu
data.text: We loved Jets when we first moved here in the late 90's but they moved , now back and better than ever with the thick crust PIZZA and it has several Flavors that are outstanding.

data.title: Oh My Gosh! Love, Love, Love their pizza!
data.text: If you have not had Jet's pizza, you are missing out! You have to try one of their deep dish pizza's you will be amazed. So Yummy!

data.title: Fantastic Pizza
data.text: While in Pompano Beach, ordered Jet's Pizza several time.  Familiar with Jet's from our visits to the Northville / Novi area of Michigan.  Pizza was absolutely delicious each and every time we ordered.  Delivery took a little long one time, but no big deal.  All in all, ordered Jet's five times while in Pompano Beach.  If you like deep dish or traditional, Jet's is fantastic.

data.title: Best Pizza in Pompano/Ft. Lauderdale Area
data.text: Ordered their deep dish pizza to my hotel room and it arrived hot and in a great sturdy box. Reasonable price for a pizza with lots of leftover. Great taste and fresh ingredients.

data.title: So so.
data.text: Got the deep dish pizza deal and it was OK. My main complaint was not receiving the butter sauce that we paid extra to get and not getting croutons on our Caesar salad. Could have been a 4/5 had they filled the order properly.

data.title: Over Priced and Bad Food.
data.text: This place is very over priced for what you receive.  Do yourself a favor and order from one of the "Big Chain" pizza joints, because the Chains are better and cheaper than this place.  And I don't like "Big Chain pizza".  I would never get food from them again.  Bad cheap taste and high price.
